abstract: Jaspen Capital Partners and its chief executive Andriy Supranonok agree to pay $30 million to settle Securities and Exchange Commission's claims that they illegally profited from corporate information stolen from newswire services.
lead_paragraph: Jaspen Capital Partners and its chief settled S.E.C. claims that they illegally profited from corporate information stolen from newswire services.

headline.main: $30 Million Settlement in Insider Trading Ring Linked to Hacking
headline.print_headline: Some Settle in a Trading Case Linked to Hacking

snippet: Jaspen Capital Partners and its chief settled S.E.C. claims that they illegally profited from corporate information stolen from newswire services.
